item.title: Stop Managing Dependencies!
item.description:
Stop Managing Dependencies!

Dependencies in Software Development have been an issue since decades and lots of practices have been built to "manage" them, creating an environment that becomes more complicated with longer time-to-market times as dependencies grow (or the product/solution grows). This is creating an illusion and no dependency management is alwys the only answer!

item.title: A Horror Story: Efficiency is Killing Productivity
item.description:
A Horror Story: Efficiency is Killing Productivity

Are you working in product development? Creative work? Research? Or any other domain where brains are the main asset? YES? Then this story is for you! It's called: "Efficiency in organisations has become counterproductive!" Take the holy grail of efficiency: Clarity - Measurements - Accountability, it makes human efforts derail!
